channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Rip-Off Britain
channel.desc: Julia Somerville, Gloria Hunniford, and Louise Minchin investigate how mysterious behaviour by one failing tour operator meant that customers were left stranded abroad with nowhere to stay and without any of the protections they thought they had. Plus more on our investigation into timeshare rogues peddling expensive, empty promises. There's advice on how to steer clear. And handy guidance if you're planning to hire a car abroad on your next trip.
